formalpara.title: Iteration 1, Test Case 8

formalpara.title: Iteration 2, Test Case 8
formalpara.para: In the LLVM output, the V9 rank is 1, rather than 0, and the shape contains a one element vector containing 1. This is incorrect for a single scalar value.
